full_summary:
### Supply of Bottled Drinking Water at High Commission of Canada in Islamabad, India

#### Call for Proposals

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of purified bottled drinking water to the Canadian High Commission in Islamabad, Pakistan.

**Overview:**
DFATD is seeking a qualified supplier to provide bottled drinking water that meets the requirements specified in the Statement of Work (Appendix A). The Work will commence on the contract award date (expected to be January 1, 2023). However, in unusual circumstances, the contract may be awarded earlier or later.

**Key Requirements:**
* Selection of a reliable supplier to enter into a contract for the supply and delivery of bottled drinking water to the Canadian High Commission in Islamabad, Pakistan
* Supply and delivery of purified bottled drinking water in accordance with the requirements specified in the Statement of Work (Appendix A)
* Contractor's personnel will be escorted and placed under the supervision of High Commission's personnel at all times during the performance of the Work

**Evaluation Criteria:**
* Compliance with the requirements of the bid solicitation
* Meeting of all mandatory technical evaluation criteria

**Submission and Contact Information:**
* Tenders must be submitted to the GAC Bid Receiving Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Contact Information:**
* Carmelia DaSilva, Bid Officer
* Email: carmelia.dasilva@international.gc.ca
* Address: 200 Prom. du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G4, Canada
